Articles.Content: When I load ships (mainly my space station) either from another ship or the tracking station sometimes when it loads, the ship will rip apart for no reason. I don't know how to fix the issue and I'm quite annoyed at it as I accidentally pressed the save button when it happened and now I can't get my space station back. (I do use mods)

This is caused most likely by parts clipping into eachother. If the ship is built and left alone with these parts all is well but if it is docked to another ship and then reloaded at a later date the forced physics load can cause instantaneous disassembly. The solution is don't have more than 1 part on an individual node in a stack.

If you have RemoteTech2 go into the GameData and take out everything out of the RemoteTech2 folder except for the parts folder and wait until they fix RemoteTech If you look into the tracking station and see many copies of the same ship delete them all but one. Its happened to me many times and is very annoying.
